# ai_standard_hair (Arnold) â€” Property Reference
# Use with set_material_property / set_material_properties
# Map slots use _shader suffix. Clear with: value="undefined"

## Base
base : float                            # base weight 0.0-1.0
base_color : color                      # (color R G B)
base_color_shader : texturemap          # texture map slot

## Melanin (physical hair color model)
melanin : float                         # 0.0 = white/blonde, 1.0 = black
melanin_shader : texturemap
melanin_redness : float                 # 0.0 = no red, 1.0 = full red
melanin_redness_shader : texturemap
melanin_randomize : float               # strand-to-strand variation
melanin_randomize_shader : texturemap

## Roughness
roughness : float                       # longitudinal roughness
roughness_shader : texturemap
roughness_azimuthal : float             # cross-section roughness
roughness_azimuthal_shader : texturemap
roughness_anisotropic : boolean         # decouple azimuthal from longitudinal

## Specular
ior : float                             # index of refraction (default ~1.55)
ior_shader : texturemap
shift : float                           # cuticle tilt angle
shift_shader : texturemap
scattering_mode : integer               # 0=R+TT+TRT, 1=dual scattering

## Tints (advanced color control)
specular_tint : color                   # primary reflection tint
specular_tint_shader : texturemap
specular2_tint : color                  # secondary reflection tint
specular2_tint_shader : texturemap
transmission_tint : color               # transmission tint
transmission_tint_shader : texturemap

## Diffuse
diffuse : float                         # diffuse weight (usually 0 for hair)
diffuse_color : color
diffuse_color_shader : texturemap

## Emission
emission : float
emission_color : color
emission_color_shader : texturemap

## Opacity
opacity : color                         # (color 255 255 255) = fully opaque
opacity_shader : texturemap

## Advanced
indirect_diffuse : float
indirect_specular : float
extra_depth : integer                   # extra ray depth for hair
extra_samples : integer
